description: Aloo methi fried Bondas (Savory potato balls) made into a delicious curry main dish. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
keywords: lentil potato curry, vegan curry recipe
name: Aloo Methi Bonda Curry (Potato Fenugreek Balls In Gravy)
recipeIngredient: handful of fresh Methi/Fenugreek leaves chopped (or any greens)
1/2 teaspoon chili powder (or to taste for spice)
For the batter used for coating
1 teaspoon garam masala or (1/4 teaspoons each of mustard seeds, coriander powder, cumin powder, 1 bay leaf and a few fennel seeds)

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the potatoes and add everything else except ingredients for the batter. Mix well, taste to check for salt and spices, adjust and mix. Make small balls and keep aside.
To make the batter, blend the besan, oats, garlic, salt and some water. Add water a tablespoon at a time to get a thick pasty consistency.
Dip the balls in the batter and deep fry them on medium heat. Serve these balls as snack with cilantro chutney, or tomato ketchup,
